entry.title: BIP: Full Replace-by-Fee deployment schedule
entry.summary: In an email exchange on June 29, 2015, Natanael expressed his frustration to an unknown recipient who did not relay the items he sent them. When the recipient responded with a lack of concern, Natanael replied that he would simply boot them and replace them with someone who would fulfill their responsibility. For Natanael, it was important that he not waste any connection slots in sending information into a black hole.
